basic.description: This is the second of two laboratory courses in the third year of the General Option of the Mechanical Engineering program.  Lecture topics and course assignments are selected to provide the background required to undertake the laboratory work.  Lab modules from  MECH 396/397/398 completed but not counted for credit may be included for credit in this course.
basic.subject: MECH
basic.title: Mech Eng Lab II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Must be registered in a BSCE program
